name: Yours, remotely
description:
In a quarantine cell, a traveller strikes up a conversation.

This is a sequel to Under A Caustic Snow, I Danced, although it is not necessary to have played that first.

-

Made for the Bitsy Isolation Jam.  Somewhat inspired by using Lex during the covid19 quarantine.

Thank you to Adam for making Bitsy, and Sean for hacking it.
